message: Hi! I am John from StateDebug Plumbing, been doing plumbing repairs in Dallas for 15 years. My email is statedebug.plumbing@gmail.com and my phone is (555) 123-4567. We specialize in emergency plumbing repairs and work within 25 miles of downtown Dallas. I have all proper licenses and insurance. I would like to create a contractor account so I can start bidding on plumbing projects. Can you help me get set up?
